page.title: 02 Wharton School
page.content: Our school is{Wharton Junior {School.}It was built in 1848 and is situated in School Road.{Queen {Victoria}helped to pay for the school which cost Â£1300 and took one year to build. Over the years there have been many headmasters and headmistresses. Originally our school was three schools,a boys',a girls'and a primary. There is a house opposite the school which was the headteacher's house.It is no longer used for this purpose. The school has changed a lot.There were no lights when it was first built.The school would be dark because the windows were small.The toilets were outside in a corner of the playground.The children would have written on slates.
